data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dankittipakul, Pakawin, Tavano, Maria, Chotwong, Wimolwan, Singtripop, Tippawan (2012): New synonym and descriptions of two new species of the spider genus Clubiona Latreille, 1804 from Thailand (Araneae, Clubionidae). Zootaxa 3532: 51-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210494
